wikipedia_page.main: Air Chief Marshal Sir William Lawrence Mary MacDonald,  (11 August 1908 – 9 November 1984) was a Royal Air Force Officer who served as Commander-in-Chief of the Near East Air Force from 1958 to 1962.

response: * William MacDonald (New Zealand politician) (1862–1920), cabinet minister and briefly Leader of the Opposition
